homeScreen.title: Welcome to AI Career Mentor
homeScreen.subtitle: Your Personal Career Development Assistant
homeScreen.description: Discover your ideal career path with AI-powered guidance. Take our comprehensive survey and receive a personalized career development plan tailored to your experience, interests, and goals.

personalized.title: Personalized Guidance
personalized.description: Get career advice tailored specifically to your background and aspirations

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiPowered.description: Leverage cutting-edge AI technology for comprehensive career analysis

actionable.title: Actionable Plans
actionable.description: Receive step-by-step career development plans you can implement immediately

loginScreen.title: Welcome Back
loginScreen.subtitle: Sign in to continue your career journey

errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

registerScreen.title: Create Your Account
registerScreen.subtitle: Join thousands who've transformed their careers
registerScreen.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

messages.success: Account created successfully! Redirecting to login...

errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordTooWeak: Password is too weak. Please include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

surveyScreen.title: Career Discovery Survey
surveyScreen.subtitle: Help us understand your career aspirations
surveyScreen.description: This comprehensive survey will help our AI create a personalized career development plan for you.

experience.label: What's your current experience level?
experience.description: Select the level that best describes your professional experience

interests.label: Which areas interest you most?
interests.description: Select all that apply - this helps us understand your preferences

skills.label: What are your strongest technical skills?
skills.placeholder: e.g., JavaScript, Python, React, SQL, AWS...

goal.label: What's your primary career goal?
goal.description: Be as specific as possible - this helps create a targeted plan
goal.placeholder: e.g., Become a full-stack developer at a tech startup within 18 months

examples.title: Example goals:
items: Transition from marketing to UX design within 1 year
Advance to senior developer role with AI specialization
Start my own tech company in the fintech space

budget.label: What's your learning budget?
budget.description: This helps us recommend appropriate resources

validation.interestsRequired: Please select at least one area of interest
validation.goalTooShort: Please provide more detail about your goal

messages.noAiResponse: No response received from AI. Please try again.
messages.submitError: Failed to submit survey. Please try again.

dashboardScreen.title: Your Career Dashboard
dashboardScreen.subtitle: Track your progress and explore opportunities

messages.noPlan: No career plan found. Complete the survey to get started!
messages.planGenerated: Your new career plan has been generated!
messages.fetchError: Unable to load dashboard data. Please refresh.

logoutConfirm.title: Sign Out
logoutConfirm.text: Are you sure you want to sign out? You'll need to sign in again to access your career plan.

footer.title: AI Career Mentor
footer.description: Transform your career journey with AI-powered guidance. Get personalized career development plans tailored to your goals and aspirations.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.
